text: jeon-e yoseb-i bunmyeonghan yejeung-eul gajigo neohuiege ileuleoss-eudoe neohuineun geuga on immuleul kkeunh-im-eobs-i uisimhayeossdeola geuga imjonghayeoss-eul ttaeneun geu ihulo hananimkkeseo eotteon seonji jado bonaeji anh-eul geos-iyo lago neohuineun malhayeoss-euni hananim-eun joeag-eulnahgo uisimsog-e saneun geudeul-eul banghwang tolog hayeossnola
